title: Jacobson on womens clubs in Oklahoma - context

content.question: The source demonstrates which of the following historical developments in the African American community in the early twentieth century?

choices.label: The promotion of equality through highlighting the dignity and determination of Black women
The highlighting of anti-Black violence through journalism
The challenging of racist stereotypes through the arts
The coordination of efforts to fight political discrimination

content.answer: The promotion of equality through highlighting the dignity and determination of Black women

topic.text: 3.8: Lifting as We Climb: Uplift Ideologies and Black Women's Rights and Leadership

skill.text: 1.A: Identify and explain course concepts, developments, and processes.
